channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report E-2025050022
item.description:
Report E-2025050022

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-06
  • City: DOVER
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver stuck 5K tank at 46 inches and was unloading ULSD first and by itself. Says tank locked up and fuel was still in hose. He disconnected hose to pour in spill bucket when bucket was knocked over causing spill. Driver used all spill pads on truck. The spill was contained, no soil, water or drains were impacted. CDG was contacted and managed the cleanup.
